mapper.select: select * from notice order by n_no
select * from notice where n_title like '%'|| #{titleInput} ||'%' and n_sortation like '%'||#{selectOption}||'%' order by n_no
mapper.update: update notice set n_sortation = #{selectOption}, n_title = #{n_title}, n_txt = #{n_txt}, n_date = sysdate where n_no = #{n_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where n_title like '%'||#{titleInput}||'%'

select * from (select rownum as rn, n_no, n_sortation, n_title, n_txt, n_date from( select * from notice where n_title like '%'||#{titleInput}||'%'
and n_sortation = '안내'
and n_sortation = '매장'
and n_sortation = '프로모션'
order by n_no desc) )where rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}
select * from faq order by f_no
select * from faq where f_title like '%'|| #{titleInput} ||'%' and f_sortation like '%'||#{selectOption}||'%' order by f_no
mapper.update: update faq set f_sortation = #{selectOption}, f_title = #{f_title}, f_txt = #{f_txt}, f_date = sysdate where f_no = #{f_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from faq where f_title like '%'||#{titleInput}||'%'

select * from (select rownum as rn, f_no, f_sortation, f_title, f_txt, f_date from( select * from faq where f_title like '%'||#{titleInput}||'%'
and f_sortation = '주문/배송'
and f_sortation = '상품관련'
and f_sortation = '장착관련'
and f_sortation = '반품/교환/취소'
and f_sortation = '회원'
order by f_no desc) )where rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}
